name: Feeble (itch)
description:
Feeble is a short prototype puzzle game about a small inept goblin who finds himself trapped in a dungeon deep underground. Place various types of blocks to lead Feeble through the dungeon, avoiding deadly traps, and picking up (optional) keys along the way.

Estimated playtime:  ~55 minutes  (All levels and all 7 optional keys)

UPDATE 2/23/22: 

Added:

Level Select screen and 1 additional level

Changed:

Unsupported wooden bridge breaks at set interval rather than randomized

Credits

All coding and art done by me.

Music by Komiku. Link to their bandcamp here: https://chezmonplaisir.bandcamp.com/track/poupis-theme

All other sound effects were found for free on the internet.

Made in Game Maker Studio 2

Thank you for playing!
